CustomField.description: Returns the primary reason for DoA. If more than 1 aspects have the same highest DoA level (e.g., ARR Discount and Invoice Period are COO level), then the primary reason is decided in the following order: Contraction, ARR Discount, One-off Discount, Invoice Period, Payment Period.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK( DoA_Approver__c ), "Not Required", IF( TEXT(DoA_Level_Contraction__c) = "Pricing Committee", "Contraction", IF( TEXT(DoA_Level_ARR_Discount__c) = "Pricing Committee", "ARR Discount", IF( TEXT(DoA_Level_One_off_Discount__c) = "Pricing Committee", "One-off Discount", IF( TEXT(DoA_Level_Billing_Cadence__c) = "Pricing Committee", "Invoice Period",
IF(TEXT(Ultimate_DoA_Level__c) = TEXT(DoA_Level_Contraction__c), "Contraction", IF(TEXT(Ultimate_DoA_Level__c) = TEXT(DoA_Level_ARR_Discount__c), "ARR Discount", IF(TEXT(Ultimate_DoA_Level__c) = TEXT(DoA_Level_One_off_Discount__c), "One-off Discount", IF(TEXT(Ultimate_DoA_Level__c) = TEXT(DoA_Level_Billing_Cadence__c), "Invoice Period", "Payment Term" )))) )))) )
CustomField.label: Primary Reason for DoA
